full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 260 Filed 04/30/21 Page 2 of 2

The Honorable Alison J. Nathan
April 30, 2021
Page 2

Accordingly, we respectfully request that the Court issue an order directing the MDC to accept the master hard drives either from defense counsel or from the government. We will send a copy of this letter to the MDC Legal Department so that they can note any objections they may have.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

/s/ Christian Everdell
Christian R. Everdell
COHEN & GRESSER LLP
800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor
New York, New York 10022
(212) 957-7600

cc: All Counsel of Record (By ECF)
MDC Legal Department

DOJ-OGR-00004064

additional_notes: The document appears to be a formal letter from a law firm to a judge, discussing a legal matter and requesting a court order. The document is well-formatted and legible, with no visible redactions or damage.
